top_stories.title: Google DeepMind Unveils AlphaGenome: A Unified Sequence-to-Function Model Using Hybrid Transformers and U-Nets to Decode the Human Genome
top_stories.description: Google DeepMind is expanding its biological toolkit beyond the world of protein folding. After the success of AlphaFold, the Google’s research team has introduced AlphaGenome. This is a unified deep learning model designed for sequence to function genomics. This represents a major shift in how we model the human genome. AlphaGenome does not treat DNA […] The post Google DeepMind Unveils AlphaGenome: A Unified Sequence-to-Function Model Using Hybrid Transformers and U-Nets to Decode the Human...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
top_stories.content: Google DeepMind is expanding its biological toolkit beyond the world of protein folding. After the success of AlphaFold, the Google’s research team has introduced AlphaGenome. top_stories.title: Anthropic releases new AI ‘constitution’ for Claude
top_stories.description: Anthropic PBC today released a new version of Claude’s constitution, a document that outlines how the large language model series should process prompts. The company published the original version of the file in May 2023. The document contained instructions designed to prevent Claude from generating harmful or unhelpful output. Anthropic determined that those instructions had […] The post Anthropic releases new AI ‘constitution’ for Claude appeared first on SiliconANGLE.
top_stories.author: Maria Deutscher
top_stories.content: Anthropic PBC today released a new version of Claude’s constitution, a document that outlines how the large language model series should process prompts. The company published the original version of the file in May 2023. The document contained instructions designed to prevent Claude from generating harmful or unhelpful output. top_stories.title: Build reliable Agentic AI solution with Amazon Bedrock: Learn from Pushpay’s journey on GenAI evaluation
top_stories.description: In this post, we walk you through Pushpay's journey in building this solution and explore how Pushpay used Amazon Bedrock to create a custom generative AI evaluation framework for continuous quality assurance and establishing rapid iteration feedback loops on AWS.
top_stories.author: Roger Wang
top_stories.content: In this post, we walk you through Pushpay's journey in building this solution and explore how Pushpay used Amazon Bedrock to create a custom generative AI evaluation framework for continuous quality assurance and establishing rapid iteration feedback loops on AWS.

top_stories.title: Scaling PostgreSQL to power 800 million ChatGPT users
top_stories.description: An inside look at how OpenAI scaled PostgreSQL to millions of queries per second using replicas, caching, rate limiting, and workload isolation.
top_stories.content: An inside look at how OpenAI scaled PostgreSQL to millions of queries per second using replicas, caching, rate limiting, and workload isolation.

top_stories.title: Accelerating Science: A Blueprint for a Renewed National Quantum Initiative
top_stories.description: Quantum technologies are rapidly emerging as foundational capabilities for economic competitiveness, national security and scientific leadership in the 21st century. Sustained U.S. leadership in quantum information science is critical to ensuring that breakthroughs in computing, sensing, networking and materials translate into secure technologies and industries, a skilled domestic workforce and long-term strategic advantage. To secure Read Article
